name: Startup Alchemy
description:
Startup Alchemy A potion shop VR game

You are head of a recently built potion shop, by combining your entrepreneurship skills with sheer determination you have managed to make your dream a reality. The last two years were spent dreaming of this moment and finally, you're head of your very own apothecary. But wait, how do you make a potion again?

Mix together elements, potions, and some creatures and discover different potions with different effects. Test out the potions until you have a potion that can fulfill your orders!

The game is currently unfinished, is missing features, and may contain bugs.

Studio Gaffers is...

  • David Barsamian
  • Felix Khon
